title: T206 FS Mike Donlin Fielding/Terry Turner Portrait

posts.post_title: T206 FS Mike Donlin Fielding/Terry Turner Portrait
posts.post_content:
Hello Guys, 
Ill will gladly email images of the cards, for the life of me I can not upload images to this site. My email address is [url]pjs3478@aol.com[/url].  First to comment sold will trump any negotiations.  Price net to me and includes shipping:

~~~Mike Donlin Fielding Short Print~~~
1.) PSA PR 1 Mike Donlin Fielding with a Piedmont 150 back.  
Cert # 46370298.  Price: $50 NEW PRICE $45
2.) SGC 10 Poor 1 Mike Donlin Fielding with a Piedmont 150 back
Cert # 1363471-219 Price: $45 NEW PRICE $40 (SOLD)
3.) SGC 20 Fair 1.5 Mike Donlin Fielding with a Piedmont 150 back(green crayon X mark on Back).
Cert # 2004381-363 Price: $50 NEW PRICE $45 (SOLD)
4.) SGC 20 Fair 1.5 Mike Donlin Fielding with a Piedmont 150 back (n.f. initials written with pencil lower back corner) 
Cert # 1390388-011 Price: $50 (SOLD)
5.) PSA FR 1.5 Mike Donlin Fielding with a Piedmont 150 back.
Cert # 47790508 Price: $60 (SOLD)
6.) PSA Good 2(MK) Mike Donlin Fielding with a Piedmont 150 back.(Zero is colored in on the 150)
Cert # 46370299 Price: $60 NEW PRICE $55 (SOLD)

~~~Terry Turner Portrait~~~
1.) PSA FR 1.5 Terry Turner Portrait with a Piedmont 150 back.
Cert # 41431383 Price: $65 NEW PRICE $60(SOLD)
2.) PSA FR 1.5 Terry Turner Portrait with a Piedmont 150 back.
Cert # 47790522 Price $65 NEW PRICE $60 (SOLD)
3.) PSA Good 2 Terrry Turner Portrait with a Piedmont 150 back.
Cert # 20032137 Price $80 NEW PRICE $75 (SOLD)
Donlin PSA 1.5 sold to me, thank you Paul
Hi Paul - just sent email request for images. Thanks!

I'll take one of the PSA 1.5 Turner cards. Just sent DM. 

Thanks,
Brian
It's yours Brian.  My PayPal is [url]pjszeliga@philasd.org[/url] and send me your address.  Thanks, Paul
